narammala, giruulla, dambaadeniya pradeshayanhi pasugiyada (06) pawathi janahamu rasak amathamin amathiwaraya ese sandahan kele ya.boho pradeshayan aawaranaya wana paridi widuliya labadi athi bawa pawasana ee mahatha methek widuliya nomathi sama pradeshayakatama menma sama niwesakatama 2012 awasan wana wita widuliya labadima aniwaryenma sidu karana bawada hethema kiwe ya.atham paksha ha pudgalayan mathiwaranawaladi mewani porondu laba dunnada wathman mathiwarana jayagrahana ilakka karagena porondu nodena bawada priyadarshana yapa sihipath kele ya.amathi anura priyadarshana yapa mahatha meseda kiweya.pasugiya kalaya purawatama oba apa mathiwarana kihipayakata muhuna dila , in wishishta lesa jayagrahanaya karala thamayi 2010 maha mathiwaranayata muhuna denne.pasugiya kalaye laba gath jayagrahana samanga sansandanaya karaddi mewara maha mathiwaranaya apa me wana witath jayagena hamarayi.
